mapper.select: SELECT p.PATIENTNAME "title", p.FAMILYNO "familyNo", TO_CHAR(s.SERVICEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')||'T'||s.SERVICESTARTTIME||':00:00' "start", TO_CHAR(s.SERVICEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')||'T'||s.SERVICEENDTIME||':00:00' "end", s.SERVICESTARTTIME "serviceStartTime", s.SERVICEENDTIME "serviceEndTime", s.SERVICENO "serviceNo", f.familytel "familyTel" FROM PATIENT p, SERVICEAPPLY s, FAMILY f WHERE f.FAMILYNO = s.FAMILYNO AND p.PATIENTNO = s.PATIENTNO AND s.SERVICESTATUS = 'S03' AND s.SERVICEDATE = #{serviceDate} AND s.HELPERNO = #{helperNo}

SELECT p.PATIENTNAME "title", TO_CHAR(s.SERVICEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')||'T'||s.SERVICESTARTTIME||':00:00' "start", TO_CHAR(s.SERVICEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')||'T'||s.SERVICEENDTIME||':00:00' "end", s.SERVICESTARTTIME "serviceStartTime", s.SERVICEENDTIME "serviceEndTime", s.SERVICENO "serviceNo" FROM PATIENT p, SERVICEAPPLY s WHERE p.PATIENTNO = s.PATIENTNO AND s.SERVICESTATUS = 'S03' AND s.HELPERNO = #{helperNo}

SELECT f.FAMILYNAME "familyName", f.FAMILYTEL "familyTel", f.FAMILYEMAIL "familyEmail", f.FAMILYNO "familyNo", p.PATIENTNAME "patientName", MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YEAR'), TRUNC(p.PATIENTBIRTH,'YEAR') ) /12 +1 "patientBirth", p.PATIENTADDR "patientAddr", p.PATIENTMEDICATION "patientMedication", p.PATIENTBLOOD "patientBlood", p.PATIENTSEX "patientSex", p.PATIENTTEL "patientTel", p.PATIENTFAMILYTEL "patientFamilyTel", p.PATIENTDISEASE "patientDisease", p.PATIENTGRADE "patientGrade", p.PATIENTUNIQUE "patientUnique", p.PATIENTNO "patientNo", s.SERVICEDEMAND "serviceDemand", s.SERVICESTARTTIME "serviceStartTime", s.SERVICEENDTIME "serviceEndTime", s.SERVICENO "serviceNo", s.SERVICEDATE "serviceDate", s.APPLYDATE "applyDate" FROM PATIENT p, FAMILY f, SERVICEAPPLY s WHERE s.PATIENTNO = p.PATIENTNO AND s.FAMILYNO = f.FAMILYNO AND s.SERVICENO = #{value}
SELECT REALSTARTTIME "realStartTime", REALENDTIME "realEndTime" FROM SERVICEHISTORY WHERE SERVICENO = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SERVICEHISTORY(SERVICENO, REALSTARTTIME) VALUES (#{serviceNo}, SYSDATE)
